tests.title: should display quiz with first question
tests.fullTitle: Quiz and Promo Code System should display quiz with first question
tests.code:
cy.contains('Test Your Spice Knowledge').should('be.visible');
cy.contains('Which of our spices gives biryani its beautiful golden hue?').should('be.visible');

tests.title: should complete quiz with perfect score and get QUIZMASTER15 promo
